Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the connection between the birth dates of prominent Democrats and the UFO crash near Roswell, as there is no factual basis for this connection.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the birth dates of prominent Democrats are linked to the Roswell incident.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the UFO crash near Roswell actually occurred and that it had any influence on the birth dates of the mentioned Democrats, which is a problematic assumption.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the debris found near Roswell was part of a crashed balloon device used for spying on the Soviets, not a UFO.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that none of the Democrats mentioned were born in April 1948 and that six of them were born years before the Roswell incident.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that the birth dates of the mentioned Democrats have no connection to the Roswell incident and are purely coincidental.
